steps.description: Break the curse on the Great Deku Tree.
steps.walkthrough: Obtain the Kokiri Sword and Deku Shield, then enter the Great Deku Tree. Navigate the dungeon and defeat Queen Gohma.

steps.description: Clear Dodongo's Cavern of the dodongos.
steps.walkthrough: Use bombs to defeat the dodongos and solve the puzzles within the cavern. Defeat King Dodongo to obtain the Goron's Ruby.

steps.description: Rescue Princess Ruto from inside Lord Jabu-Jabu.
steps.walkthrough: Find a fish to offer to Lord Jabu-Jabu to gain entry. Navigate the dungeon's many passages and defeat Barinade.
As an adult, navigate the twisted corridors and haunted rooms of the Forest Temple. Defeat Phantom Ganon to awaken Saria as a Sage.

steps.description: Brave the heat of the Fire Temple.
steps.walkthrough: Rescue the imprisoned Gorons and navigate the lava-filled chambers. Defeat the fiery dragon Volvagia to awaken Darunia as a Sage.
Navigate the treacherous Ice Cavern to obtain the Iron Boots, then use them to conquer the Water Temple and defeat Morpha to awaken Ruto as a Sage.

steps.description: Face the horrors of the Shadow Temple.
steps.walkthrough: After a trip to the Bottom of the Well to obtain the Lens of Truth, you'll face the horrors of the Shadow Temple and its boss, Bongo Bongo, to awaken Impa as a Sage.
Journey through the Gerudo Fortress and across the Haunted Wasteland to the Spirit Temple, where you'll battle the twin witches, Twinrova, to awaken Nabooru as a Sage.

steps.description: Storm Ganon's Castle and defeat the Great King of Evil.
steps.walkthrough: In the final confrontation, you'll storm Ganon's Castle, overcome his trials, and face the Great King of Evil himself.

steps.description: Borrow masks from the Happy Mask Salesman and sell them to various characters across Hyrule.
steps.walkthrough: Completing this quest grants you the powerful Mask of Truth.

steps.description: This lengthy trading sequence involves delivering items across Hyrule.
steps.walkthrough: Ultimately, you'll obtain the unbreakable and powerful Biggoron's Sword.

steps.description: Learn Epona's Song and win a race against Ingo.
steps.walkthrough: Visit Lon Lon Ranch to learn Epona's Song and win a race against Ingo to gain the trust and companionship of your loyal horse, Epona.

steps.description: Hunt down 100 Gold Skulltulas hidden throughout Hyrule.
steps.walkthrough: Break a curse on a family in Kakariko Village and receive various rewards.

steps.description: Seek out hidden Great Fairy Fountains.
steps.walkthrough: Receive magical powers like Din's Fire, Nayru's Love, and upgrades to your magic meter and spin attack.

steps.description: Test your skills in the Gerudo Training Grounds.
steps.walkthrough: Complete the trials to earn the valuable Ice Arrows.

steps.description: Hunt down ten Big Poes in Hyrule Field and sell them to a collector.
steps.walkthrough: After obtaining Epona, you can hunt down ten Big Poes in Hyrule Field and sell them to a collector for a reward.

steps.description: Play a custom eight-note song to Bonooru the scarecrow at Lake Hylia.
steps.walkthrough: Playing this 'Scarecrow's Song' in specific locations will summon his brother Pierre, allowing you to reach otherwise inaccessible areas.
